verses.verse: So king <S%H4428><s%> SHlomo <S%H8010><s%> was king <S%H4428><s%> over all Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>.
And these were the princes <S%H8269><s%> which he had; Azariah <S%H5838><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Zadok <S%H6659><s%> the Kohen <S%H3548><s%>,

Elihoreph <S%H456><s%> and Ahiah <S%H281><s%>, the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Shisha <S%H7894><s%>, scribes <S%H5608><s%> <S%H8802><s%>; Y'hoshafat <S%H3092><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ahilud <S%H286><s%>, the recorder <S%H2142><s%> <S%H8688><s%>.
And Benaiah <S%H1141><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Y'hoyada <S%H3077><s%> was over the host <S%H6635><s%>: and Zadok <S%H6659><s%> and Evyatar <S%H54><s%> were the Kohanim <S%H3548><s%>:

And Azariah <S%H5838><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Natan <S%H5416><s%> was over the officers <S%H5324><s%> <S%H8737><s%>: and Zabud <S%H2071><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Natan <S%H5416><s%> was principal officer <S%H3548><s%>, and the king's <S%H4428><s%> friend <S%H7463><s%>:
And Ahishar <S%H301><s%> was over the household <S%H1004><s%>: and Adoniram <S%H141><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Abda <S%H5653><s%> was over the tribute <S%H4522><s%>.

And SHlomo <S%H8010><s%> had twelve <S%H8147><s%> <S%H6240><s%> officers <S%H5324><s%> <S%H8737><s%> over all Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, which provided victuals <S%H3557><s%> <S%H8773><s%> for the king <S%H4428><s%> and his household <S%H1004><s%>: each man <S%H259><s%> his month <S%H2320><s%> in a year <S%H8141><s%> made provision <S%H3557><s%> <S%H8771><s%>.
And these are their names <S%H8034><s%>: The son of Hur <S%H1133><s%>, in mount <S%H2022><s%> Efrayim <S%H669><s%>:
The son of Dekar <S%H1128><s%> <S%H8677><s%> <S%H1857><s%>, in Makaz <S%H4739><s%>, and in Shaalbim <S%H8169><s%>, and Bethshemesh <S%H1053><s%>, and Elonbethhanan <S%H358><s%>:
The son of Hesed <S%H1136><s%> <S%H8676><s%> <S%H2618><s%>, in Aruboth <S%H700><s%>; to him pertained Sochoh <S%H7755><s%>, and all the land <S%H776><s%> of Hepher <S%H2660><s%>:
The son of Abinadab <S%H1125><s%>, in all the region <S%H5299><s%> of Dor <S%H1756><s%>; which had Taphath <S%H2955><s%> the daughter <S%H1323><s%> of SHlomo <S%H8010><s%> to wife <S%H802><s%>:

Baana <S%H1195><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ahilud <S%H286><s%>; to him pertained Taanach <S%H8590><s%> and Megiddo <S%H4023><s%>, and all Bethshean <S%H1052><s%>, which is by <S%H681><s%> Zartanah <S%H6891><s%> beneath Yizre`el <S%H3157><s%>, from Bethshean <S%H1052><s%> to Hevelmeholah <S%H65><s%>, even unto the place that is beyond <S%H5676><s%> Jokneam <S%H3361><s%>:

The son of Geber <S%H1127><s%>, in Ramothgilead <S%H1568><s%> <S%H7433><s%>; to him pertained the towns <S%H2333><s%> of Jair <S%H2971><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of M'nasheh <S%H4519><s%>, which are in Gil`ad <S%H1568><s%>; to him also pertained the region <S%H2256><s%> of Argob <S%H709><s%>, which is in Bashan <S%H1316><s%>, threescore <S%H8346><s%> great <S%H1419><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> with walls <S%H2346><s%> and brasen <S%H5178><s%> bars <S%H1280><s%>:
Ahinadab <S%H292><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Iddo <S%H5714><s%> had Mahanaim <S%H4266><s%>:
Ahimaaz <S%H290><s%> was in Naftali <S%H5321><s%>; he also took <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8804><s%> Basmath <S%H1315><s%> the daughter <S%H1323><s%> of SHlomo <S%H8010><s%> to wife <S%H802><s%>:
Baanah <S%H1195><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Hushai <S%H2365><s%> was in Asher <S%H836><s%> and in Aloth <S%H1175><s%>:
Y'hoshafat <S%H3092><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Paruah <S%H6515><s%>, in Yissakhar <S%H3485><s%>:
Shimei <S%H8096><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Elah <S%H414><s%>, in Binyamin <S%H1144><s%>:

Geber <S%H1398><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Uri <S%H221><s%> was in the country <S%H776><s%> of Gil`ad <S%H1568><s%>, in the country <S%H776><s%> of Sichon <S%H5511><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of the Amorites <S%H567><s%>, and of Og <S%H5747><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Bashan <S%H1316><s%>; and he was the only <S%H259><s%> officer <S%H5333><s%> which was in the land <S%H776><s%>.

Y'hudah <S%H3063><s%> and Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> were many <S%H7227><s%>, as the sand <S%H2344><s%> which is by the sea <S%H3220><s%> in multitude <S%H7230><s%>, eating <S%H398><s%> <S%H8802><s%> and drinking <S%H8354><s%> <S%H8802><s%>, and making merry <S%H8056><s%>.

And SHlomo <S%H8010><s%> reigned <S%H4910><s%> <S%H8802><s%> over all kingdoms <S%H4467><s%> from the river <S%H5104><s%> unto the land <S%H776><s%> of the Philistines <S%H6430><s%>, and unto the border <S%H1366><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>: they brought <S%H5066><s%> <S%H8688><s%> presents <S%H4503><s%>, and served <S%H5647><s%> <S%H8802><s%> SHlomo <S%H8010><s%> all the days <S%H3117><s%> of his life <S%H2416><s%>.

And SHlomo's <S%H8010><s%> provision <S%H3899><s%> for one <S%H259><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> was thirty <S%H7970><s%> measures <S%H3734><s%> of fine flour <S%H5560><s%>, and threescore <S%H8346><s%> measures <S%H3734><s%> of meal <S%H7058><s%>,

Ten <S%H6235><s%> fat <S%H1277><s%> oxen <S%H1241><s%>, and twenty <S%H6242><s%> oxen <S%H1241><s%> out of the pastures <S%H7471><s%>, and an hundred <S%H3967><s%> sheep <S%H6629><s%>, beside harts <S%H354><s%>, and roebucks <S%H6643><s%>, and fallowdeer <S%H3180><s%>, and fatted <S%H75><s%> <S%H8803><s%> fowl <S%H1257><s%>.

For he had dominion <S%H7287><s%> <S%H8802><s%> over all the region on this side <S%H5676><s%> the river <S%H5104><s%>, from Tiphsah <S%H8607><s%> even to Azzah <S%H5804><s%>, over all the kings <S%H4428><s%> on this side <S%H5676><s%> the river <S%H5104><s%>: and he had peace <S%H7965><s%> on all sides <S%H5650><s%> <S%H8676><s%> <S%H5676><s%> round about <S%H5439><s%> him.

And Y'hudah <S%H3063><s%> and Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> dwelt <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8799><s%> safely <S%H983><s%>, every man <S%H376><s%> under his vine <S%H1612><s%> and under his fig tree <S%H8384><s%>, from Dan <S%H1835><s%> even to Be'er-Sheva <S%H884><s%>, all the days <S%H3117><s%> of SHlomo <S%H8010><s%>.

And SHlomo <S%H8010><s%> had forty <S%H705><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> stalls <S%H723><s%> of horses <S%H5483><s%> for his chariots <S%H4817><s%>, and twelve <S%H8147><s%> <S%H6240><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> horsemen <S%H6571><s%>.

And those officers <S%H5324><s%> <S%H8737><s%> provided victual <S%H3557><s%> <S%H8773><s%> for king <S%H4428><s%> SHlomo <S%H8010><s%>, and for all that came <S%H7131><s%> unto king <S%H4428><s%> SHlomo's <S%H8010><s%> table <S%H7979><s%>, every man <S%H376><s%> in his month <S%H2320><s%>: they lacked <S%H5737><s%> <S%H8762><s%> nothing <S%H1697><s%>.

Barley <S%H8184><s%> also and straw <S%H8401><s%> for the horses <S%H5483><s%> and dromedaries <S%H7409><s%> brought <S%H935><s%> <S%H8686><s%> they unto the place <S%H4725><s%> where the officers were, every man <S%H376><s%> according to his charge <S%H4941><s%>.

And 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8799><s%> SHlomo <S%H8010><s%> wisdom <S%H2451><s%> and understanding <S%H8394><s%> exceeding <S%H3966><s%> much <S%H7235><s%> <S%H8687><s%>, and largeness <S%H7341><s%> of heart <S%H3820><s%>, even as the sand <S%H2344><s%> that is on the sea <S%H3220><s%> shore <S%H8193><s%>.

And SHlomo's <S%H8010><s%> wisdom <S%H2451><s%> excelled <S%H7235><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the wisdom <S%H2451><s%> of all the children <S%H1121><s%> of the east country <S%H6924><s%>, and all the wisdom <S%H2451><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>.

For he was wiser <S%H2449><s%> <S%H8799><s%> than all men <S%H120><s%>; than Ethan <S%H387><s%> the Ezrahite <S%H250><s%>, and Heman <S%H1968><s%>, and Chalcol <S%H3633><s%>, and Darda <S%H1862><s%>, the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Mahol <S%H4235><s%>: and his fame <S%H8034><s%> was in all nations <S%H1471><s%> round about <S%H5439><s%>.
And he spake <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8762><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> proverbs <S%H4912><s%>: and his songs <S%H7892><s%> were a thousand <S%H505><s%> and five <S%H2568><s%>.

And he spake <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8762><s%> of trees <S%H6086><s%>, from the cedar tree <S%H730><s%> that is in Lebanon <S%H3844><s%> even unto the hyssop <S%H231><s%> that springeth out <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8802><s%> of the wall <S%H7023><s%>: he spake <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8762><s%> also of beasts <S%H929><s%>, and of fowl <S%H5775><s%>, and of creeping things <S%H7431><s%>, and of fishes <S%H1709><s%>.

And there came <S%H935><s%> <S%H8799><s%> of all people <S%H5971><s%> to hear <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8800><s%> the wisdom <S%H2451><s%> of SHlomo <S%H8010><s%>, from all kings <S%H4428><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%>, which had heard <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8804><s%> of his wisdom <S%H2451><s%>.
